Activity: Log in, check emails for bug tracking system access requests and grant permissions. Check for the latest build from @BENG-1.
Download and install the latest build provided by @BENG-1. Familiarize yourself with the current state of the game.
Begin executing test cases from the 'Core Mechanics' section of the test plan. Start with basic movement and shooting mechanics.
Document any bugs or issues encountered in the bug tracking system. Provide detailed steps to reproduce the issue, expected results, and actual results.
Continue executing test cases for the 'Core Mechanics' section, focusing on the cover system and any other advanced mechanics. Take breaks if the work intensity is high.
Begin executing test cases from the 'UI' section of the test plan. Test the main menu, HUD, and inventory system.
Document any bugs or issues encountered in the bug tracking system. Prioritize issues based on severity and impact on gameplay.
Move to ad-hoc testing, exploring the game in unexpected ways to uncover hidden bugs. Focus on areas that are not explicitly covered by the test plan.
Continue ad-hoc testing, paying attention to performance, stability, and overall gameplay experience.
Review the day's testing progress. Ensure all identified bugs and issues are documented in the bug tracking system. Prepare a brief progress report for the team.
